intro: Oldenlandia stricta, commonly known as the slender spiderwort, is a flowering plant native to tropical and subtropical regions. It is a member of the Rubiaceae family and typically grows as an annual herb with slender, erect stems. The plant produces small, showy flowers that are often blue or purple in color, which bloom in clusters along the stem. Its leaves are opposite, ovate, and have a slightly hairy texture. Oldenlandia stricta thrives in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in disturbed habitats such as roadsides and fields.
